td.content: s:pt presents with moderate weight loss over several months for about 10 days. she is a 29 year old white female. she does not smoke she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 59 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.

td.content: s:white female aged 31 ys with C/O moderate weight loss over several months for 8 days that is frequent. pt also reports moderate nausea, moderate vomiting. she denies drinking alcohol she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 59 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:pt with C/O moderate weight loss over several months for 5 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports moderate vomiting, moderate nausea. patient is a 31 YO white female. o:Height 59 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered EGD.

s:a 31 YO female laundry worker presents with increased moderate weight loss over several months, moderate vomiting and moderate nausea over 5 months. she denies smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 60 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.
